Home.MainTitle: Hello, my name is John, Nice to meet you：）
Home.MainSelfIntro: a front-end developer & designer</br>always curious about the last web developmnet trands and technologies.

SidePorject.ChatingWithChatGPT: Have a bad mood? Try having a talk with ChatGPT

PersonalPage.SectionOneTitle: Hi，I'm John, a front-end developer & a web designer
PersonalPage.SectionOneContent: I write JavaScript, TypeScript, and Vue3 mainly. I have UI designer and front-end developer experience, which lets me could think more softly than others. My expertise is writing code that can be easily used by everyone. That pretty much sums me up.
PersonalPage.SubTitleLang: About my level of language proficiency

WorkHistory1.List01: Developed a customer service platform and integrated third-party live customer service into the platform.
WorkHistory1.List02: Maintained the code and rebuilt the functions which went out in the latest format.
WorkHistory1.List03: Built a new code style guideline and collaborated with the designer team.

WorkHistory2.List01: Designed and coded an anime service platform with 1 graphic designer and 2 back-end developers which DAU (Daily Active Users) of over 8 million.
WorkHistory2.List02: Redesigned the company’s primary service user interface for both Android and iOS with another UI designer.
WorkHistory2.List03: Designed and coded a game-selling service platform collaborated with a background engineer.
WorkHistory2.List04: Built a design guideline that combined all platforms with a graphic designer and the back-end engineer’s team.
WorkHistory2.List05: Built an auto-compile program to make the designer team become more efficient.

WorkHistory3.List01: Designed and coded a short-term event webpage using HTML, SASS, and Javascript.
WorkHistory3.List02: Responsible for designing the UI for iOS and Android apps.

ProjectAnime.Reason: 舊版動畫播放網頁服務未更新時間過長，隨時間推移使用者在 2020 年末急速上漲 、以及過去的 UX 現在已有落差，在需求會議與UX部門的討論後，決定這次的改版。
ProjectAnime.Problem01: 使用者動線混亂，看不懂動畫播放先後順序。
ProjectAnime.Problem02: ＴＶ版與手機版的版型支援不完全。
ProjectAnime.Problem03: 彈幕過多有抖動的情況發生。
ProjectAnime.Process03: 定義 UI Components ＆ Color themes
ProjectAnime.Process01MainTitle: 在設計頁面前先確認設計準則：
ProjectAnime.Process01ListContent01: 讓用戶不會因為巨大的風格差異而迷惘。
ProjectAnime.Process01ListContent02: 讓使用者在做短的時間內能達到目的。
ProjectAnime.Process02ListContent01: 釐清整體服務動線，與頁面結構。繪製 User Flow 與 PM 進行流程優化。
ProjectAnime.Process03ListContent01: 定義暗亮色的元件，並建立 UI library 增加繪製 Mockup 速度。
ProjectAnime.Process04ListContent01: 將排列由左至右，增加動態互動效果引導使用者動線。
ProjectAnime.Process04ListContent02: 以一週為單位的動畫節目文字化，提供使用者更直接的資訊。
ProjectAnime.Process04ListContent03: 將功能相似的元件進行分類，並在視覺上進行統一。
ProjectAnime.Process04ListContent04: 重新依據功能進行分類，簡化頁面複雜度。
ProjectAnime.Process04ListTitle0501: PV 超過原本預期的 800萬 至 900萬。
ProjectAnime.Process04ListTitle0502: 半年內付費會員成長率從 4% 到 8%。

SideProjectChatGPT.Reason: チャットGPTの仕組みを掘り下げるために、Open AIのドキュメントを勉強し、パラメータを再調整してチャットGPTをポートフォリオウェアで再現します。
SideProjectChatGPT.Point01: 入力フォームは必要です、もし入力内容を書わなくまま送信ボタンを押しれば、エラーメッセージは出てきます。
SideProjectChatGPT.Point02: TypeScriptでエイシンクでAPIのやり取りを処理する
SideProjectChatGPT.Point03: メッセージのパラメータを再調整する
